src:
O‘zbekiston terma jamoasi himoyachisi Janubiy Koreyada chempionga aylandi

03 Nov 2019, 21:31

O‘zbekistonlik himoyachi Rustam Ashurmatov to‘p suradigan “Gvangju” klubi Janubiy Koreyaning ikkinchi divizionida chempionlikni qo‘lga kiritdi.


Foto: FAphotos

Ashurmatov jamoasi o‘tgan turda “Suvon Siti” ustidan g‘alabaga erishgan (3:0), uning ta’qibchisi “Pusan Ay Park” esa ochko yo‘qotgandi. Bu esa “Gvangju”ga muddatidan avval chempionlikni taqdim etdi.
3-noyabr, yakshanba kuni “Chonnam Dragons”ga qarshi kechgan bahsdan so‘ng (1:3) “Gvangju” futbolchilariga chempionat oltin medallari topshirildi.
Shu tariqa Key-Liga 2 chempionligini qo‘lga kiritgan “Gvangju” keyingi mavsum Janubiy Koreya oliy divizionida ishtirok etish imkoniyatini qo‘lga kiritdi.


Foto: FAphotos


Yanada ko‘proq futbol va sport yangiliklaridan boxabar bo‘lishni istasangiz, “Daryo”ning Telegram’dagi rasmiy sport kanali — @daryo_sport’ga obuna bo‘ling!
text:
Defender of Uzbekistan becomes champion of South Korea

03 Nov 2019, 21:31

Uzbekistan's Gwangju club, led by defender Rustam Ashurmatov, won the second division in South Korea.


Photo: FAphotos

Ashurmatov's team won "Swan City" in the last round (3-0), while his opponent "Busan Ai Park" lost points. This gave Gwangju an early championship.
Gwangju players were awarded the Gold Medals of the Championship after a draw against the Chonnam Dragons on Sunday, November 3 (1: 3).
Gwangju, who won the Champions League this season, has a chance to play in the South Korean Division.


Photo: FAphotos


For more on football and sports news, subscribe to @ river_sport!
